name: stdlib-datasets-harrison-boston-house-prices
title: Boston House Prices
description: A dataset derived from information collected by the US Census Service concerning housing in Boston, Massachusetts (1978).

resources.name: harrison-boston-house-prices-json
resources.title: Boston House Prices
resources.description: A dataset derived from information collected by the US Census Service concerning housing in Boston, Massachusetts (1978).

resources.name: harrison-boston-house-prices-csv
resources.title: Boston House Prices
resources.description: A dataset derived from information collected by the US Census Service concerning housing in Boston, Massachusetts (1978).

fields.name: crim
fields.title: Per Capita Crime
fields.description: Per capita crime rate by town.

fields.name: zn
fields.title: Large Lots
fields.description: Proportion of residential land zoned for lots over 25,000 square feet.

fields.name: indus
fields.title: Non-retail Business Acres
fields.description: Proportion of non-retail business acres per town.

fields.name: chas
fields.title: Charles River
fields.description: Charles River dummy variable (1 if tract bounds river; 0 otherwise).

fields.name: rm
fields.title: Number of Rooms
fields.description: Average number of rooms per dwelling.

fields.name: age
fields.title: Age
fields.description: Proportion of owner-occupied units built prior to 1940.

fields.name: dis
fields.title: Employment Distance
fields.description: Weighted distances to five Boston employment centers.

fields.name: rad
fields.title: Radial Accessibility Index
fields.description: Index of accessibility to radial highways.

fields.name: b
fields.title: Black Residents
fields.description: 1000(Bk-0.63)^2 where Bk is the proportion of blacks by town.

fields.name: lstat
fields.title: Lower Status
fields.description: Percent lower status of the population.

fields.name: medv
fields.title: Median Value
fields.description: Median value of owner-occupied homes in $1000's.
